name: Aarav
meaning: Peaceful and calm, Aarav symbolizes tranquility and harmony, inspiring a serene demeanor and positive outlook in life.

name: Vihaan
meaning: Dawn or the beginning of a new era, representing fresh opportunities and a bright future.

name: Ishaan
meaning: Sunlight or the direction of the Lord, symbolizing clarity, guidance, and divine blessings.

name: Rudra
meaning: The mighty one or Lord Shiva, representing strength, destruction of negativity, and transformation.

name: Aryan
meaning: Noble and honorable, a name that signifies integrity, valor, and leadership.

name: Kabir
meaning: The great or the powerful one, symbolizing wisdom, spirituality, and strength of character.

name: Anirudh
meaning: Boundless or free, representing freedom of thought and unyielding determination.

name: Reyansh
meaning: Ray of light, symbolizing hope, positivity, and a shining personality.

name: Devansh
meaning: Part of God, symbolizing divinity, purity, and spiritual connection.

name: Vivaan
meaning: Full of life, representing energy, liveliness, and enthusiasm for life.

name: Ayaan
meaning: Gift of God or a blessing, symbolizing gratitude, faith, and divine favor.

name: Shaurya
meaning: Bravery and valor, representing courage, determination, and a strong will.

name: Kiaan
meaning: Grace of God or ancient, symbolizing timeless charm and divine favor.

name: Aditya
meaning: Sun or radiance, representing enlightenment, positivity, and brilliance.

name: Nirvaan
meaning: Liberation or ultimate bliss, representing peace, spiritual fulfillment, and detachment.

name: Parth
meaning: King or Arjuna, representing leadership, bravery, and focus.

name: Rishi
meaning: Sage or learned one, representing wisdom, knowledge, and spiritual growth.

name: Laksh
meaning: Aim or goal, representing focus, ambition, and determination.

name: Harsh
meaning: Happiness or joy, symbolizing positivity and a cheerful personality.

name: Omkar
meaning: Sacred syllable Om, representing spirituality, universal energy, and divinity.

name: Shaan
meaning: A peaceful and calm person, representing nobility and pride.

name: Advaith
meaning: Unique or without a second, representing individuality and distinctiveness.

name: Pranav
meaning: The sacred sound Om, symbolizing spiritual awakening and divine connection.

name: Harit
meaning: Green or prosperous, symbolizing growth, nature, and vitality.

name: Eshan
meaning: Lord Shiva or the direction of the East, representing divine guidance and enlightenment.

name: Suryansh
meaning: Part of the sun, symbolizing brightness, vitality, and energy.

name: Vivaan
meaning: Full of life, representing energy and enthusiasm.

name: Manav
meaning: Humanity or a man, symbolizing compassion, kindness, and empathy.

name: Raghav
meaning: A name of Lord Ram, symbolizing righteousness and strength.

name: Kunal
meaning: Lotus or a child with beauty, symbolizing purity and serenity.

name: Arjun
meaning: Bright, shining or the great warrior of Mahabharata, symbolizing strength and valor.

name: Tarun
meaning: Young or youthful, representing freshness and vitality.

name: Shaurav
meaning: Glory, fame, or the essence of valor.

name: Aarush
meaning: First ray of the sun, symbolizing hope, light, and new beginnings.

name: Kartik
meaning: A name of Lord Kartikeya, representing wisdom, courage, and strength.

name: Samarth
meaning: Powerful or capable, symbolizing strength, competence, and wisdom.

name: Shivansh
meaning: Part of Lord Shiva, symbolizing divinity, peace, and serenity.

name: Krishna
meaning: A name of Lord Krishna, symbolizing divine love, beauty, and compassion.

name: Yuvraj
meaning: Prince or heir to the throne, symbolizing royalty and leadership.

name: Mmeena
meaning: Heard Working

name: Siddharth
meaning: One who has attained his goals, representing wisdom, success, and enlightenment.
